1581890.name: The Magic of Three
1581890.description:
Do you like cool and beautiful puzzles? Do you love vault and flexibility in passing? Do you like the game to give you a challenge?

If YES, then this game is for you!

Despite the simplicity of the game on the screenshots, you will find really interesting levels with multiple passages!

When creating the game, the emphasis was primarily on gameplay and thoughtful levels. Fans of interesting and non-standard puzzles will like this game! =)

Reviews, though they are few, but very good and it makes me happy! Since this is my first more or less serious game.

And in every review (well, 2 on the store's page and 1 in direct) they write that this game is much better than its description... =) I'm trying to improve. =)

The Magic of Three - is a hybrid between a puzzle platformer and a Match 3 game. Make careful use of precious gems to activate your golem's special abilities. Match stones of the same color to clear the path and reach the exit, and take delight in the challenging and clever level design.

FEATURES OF THE GAME

  • Open levels and freedom in solve puzzles in various ways by managing the golem's abilities.

  • On a level, you can always rewind time. In case of a mistake, you don't have to go through the entire level again. =) Just press the magic "Z" button. And everything will return to normal. So you can not be afraid and calmly experiment.

  • As you progress through the game, you will discover new abilities and new objects, enriching the levels with new colors.

  • If you want to play light, you can always turn on the Endless abilities mode and play with even more freedom!

  • For each level you can get 3 medals! (For completing, for collected spheres and for points)
    1. For passing the level. (This is usually not difficult if you do not complete the rest of the tasks)
    2. For the collection of all stone spheres.
    3. And for points.

PLOTThe magical civilization of stone golems had a trouble, a huge tornado reached their settlement and scattered all the knowledge and wisdom accumulated over the centuries throughout the area. All this was stored on stone energy spheres, or as the golems called them, "Spheres of Knowledge". Many turned out to be in inaccessible places for this civilization. But one young golem with a special gift decided to return what was lost.

If you are looking for a colorful, light atmosphere and at the same time challenging puzzle, then "The magic of three" will be happy to provide you with its own world, a world full of puzzles.
